name: CoverageEligibilityResponse
title: CoverageEligibilityResponse
description: This resource provides eligibility and plan details from the processing of an CoverageEligibilityRequest resource.

elements.name: CoverageEligibilityResponse
elements.description: This resource provides eligibility and plan details from the processing of an CoverageEligibilityRequest resource.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: A unique identifier assigned to this coverage eligibility request.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The status of the resource instance.

elements.name: purpose
elements.description: Code to specify whether requesting: prior authorization requirements for some service categories or billing codes; benefits for coverages specified or discovered; discovery and return of coverages for the patient; and/or validation that the specified coverage is in-force at the date/period specified or 'now' if not specified.

elements.name: patient
elements.description: The party who is the beneficiary of the supplied coverage and for whom eligibility is sought.

elements.name: servicedDate
elements.description: The date or dates when the enclosed suite of services were performed or completed.

elements.name: servicedPeriod
elements.description: The date or dates when the enclosed suite of services were performed or completed.

elements.name: created
elements.description: The date this resource was created.

elements.name: requestor
elements.description: The provider which is responsible for the request.

elements.name: request
elements.description: Reference to the original request resource.

elements.name: outcome
elements.description: The outcome of the request processing.

elements.name: disposition
elements.description: A human readable description of the status of the adjudication.

elements.name: insurer
elements.description: The Insurer who issued the coverage in question and is the author of the response.

elements.name: insurance
elements.description: Financial instruments for reimbursement for the health care products and services.

elements.name: preAuthRef
elements.description: A reference from the Insurer to which a provider may quote to when submitting claims to that insurer.

elements.name: form
elements.description: A code for the form to be used for printing the content.

elements.name: error
elements.description: Errors encountered during the processing of the request.
